text: Piero Tosi (10 April 1927 â€“ 10 August 2019) was an Italian costume designer. He designed costumes for Senso, Bellissima, The Leopard, Yesterday, Today and Tomorrow, Death in Venice, The Night Porter, and La Traviata. He won the David di Donatello for Best Costumes twice. He also won the BAFTA Award for Best Costume Design twice, and was nominated for the Academy Award for Costume Design five times. Tosi died in Rome on 10 August 2019, at the age of 92. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:BAFTA Award winners Category:1927 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian costume designers
